entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
